scripts.postinstall: npm run setup-src && npm run setup-pkgs
scripts.setup-src: cd src && cd cli && npm i --omit=optional && npm run bundle
scripts.version: echo $npm_package_version && echo %npm_package_version% && npm run version-src && npm run version-pkgs && git add .
scripts.version-src: echo $npm_package_version && echo %npm_package_version% && cd pkgs && npm exec -- neon bump -v --dir ../src/cli
scripts.version-pkgs: echo $npm_package_version && echo %npm_package_version% && cd pkgs && npm exec -- neon bump -v --dir .
scripts.dryrun: (export TAGNAME=DRYRUN.$(date +%Y-%m-%d.%H.%M.%S); echo $TAGNAME >> .logs/dryruns.log && git add .logs/dryruns.log && git commit -m $TAGNAME && git tag -a $TAGNAME -m 'publish dry-run' && git push --follow-tags)
